mil3.3.11:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso visaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya, pare ca pāyeyya, so attanāpi dukkhito bhaveyya, parepi dukkhitā bhaveyyuṃ;
mil3.3.11:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, idhekacco puggalo akusalaṃ kammaṃ cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya.
mil3.3.11:5.4: Yepi tassa anusikkhanti, tepi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
mil3.3.11:6.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, kocideva puriso sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitaṃ ekajjhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā attanā ca piveyya, pare ca pāyeyya, so attanā sukhito bhaveyya, parepi sukhitā bhaveyyuṃ;
mil3.3.11:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, idhekacco puggalo kusalaṃ kammaṃ cetanāya cetayitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
mil3.3.11:6.3: Yepi tassa anusikkhanti, tepi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
mil3.3.11:6.4: Evaṃ kho, mahārāja, cetayitalakkhaṇā cetanā abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇā cā”ti.
